original_text:
Does a bird swoop down to a trap on the ground
    when no bait is there?
Does a trap spring up from the ground
    if it has not caught anything?
korean_text: 덫을 땅에 놓지 않았는데 새가 어찌 거기 치이겠으며 잡힌 것이 없는데 덫이 어찌 땅에서 튀겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Does a bird swoop down to a trap on the ground
Does a trap spring up from the ground
if it has not caught anything?
